intro_message_part1: Hi, I am currently learning to become a software developer, focusing on Python and Machine Learning, with a passion for building and exploring new technologies.
intro_message_part2: This website is my first React project, showcasing my journey into frontend development.
intro_message_part3: Check out my other projects and the source code for this website on my
journey_description: Discover how I started my academic and professional journey in software development. From web design to Python and React.
